Title: Electromagnetic induction imaging with atomic magnetometers
Abstract: © OSA 2019 © 2019 The Author(s)We report on atomic magnetometer-based electromagnetic induction imaging. A highly-sensitive and broadly tunable radio-frequency atomic magnetometer provides the core of our system. A range of applications - from security to biomedical imaging - is discussed and demonstrated.
